title: Pork a la creme
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '28g (1oz) butter', '680g (1 1/2lb) pork fillet, cut into 2cm pieces', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 beef stock cube', '300ml (1/2pt) water', '5 tablespoons sherry', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', 'salt and pepper', '170g (6oz) button mushrooms', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '140g (5oz) double cream']
